DataElement.preferredName: National Cancer Institute Principal Investigator Identifier IBCSG Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the identifier assigned in the National Cancer Institute investigator registry to a physician approved for conducting an IBCSG clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: National Cancer Institute Principal Investigator Identifier
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the National Cancer Institute identifier for a principal investigator.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: NCI.  The National Cancer Institute, part of the National Institutes of Health of the United States Department of Health and Human Services, is the Federal Government's principal agency for cancer research.  NCI conducts, coordinates, and funds cancer research, training, health information dissemination, and other programs with respect to the cause, diagnosis, prevention, and treatment of cancer.  Access the NCI Web site at http://cancer.gov.:The person who is responsible for a specific research project or environment.

Concepts.definition: The Federal Government's principal agency for cancer research. NCI conducts, coordinates, and funds cancer research, training, health information dissemination, and other programs with respect to the cause, diagnosis, prevention, and treatment of cancer. Part of the National Institutes of Health of the United States Department of Health and Human Services.
An investigator who is responsible for all aspects of the conduct of a study.

Property.preferredDefinition: One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

Concepts.definition: One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the free text field to specify information for an IBCSG trial.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.
